Create a multiple content
Display: %s
Plugin is not configured!
Important!
jfmulticontent comes with a new updater-script which fix old content elements. You have to run this script if you are updating from older installation.
[Click here to open the updater]
Warning!
You have to use the "Update"-Button below to ensure proper working for all functions in this extension.
[<- back]
[reload this page]
Important! Please Read!
Nothing to do
Actions:
Update results:

The updater manipulates your database and due to the huge amount of configuration variants it is possible that it
might not produce the expected results.
So backup your database (at least the table tt_content) or do a t3d export of your site BEFORE
you click on any of the "DO IT" Buttons.
Search "old values" in FF
Search for jfmulticontent content elements with old values in flexforms (This fields where moved to another sheet):
Found ###COUNT### content elements.
Should the updater fix this settings?
(If you click "DO IT" all old fields will be moved to the new flexform sheet)
Search "wrong style" in FF
Search for jfmulticontent content elements with wrong style in flexforms:
Found ###COUNT### content elements.
Should the updater fix this settings?
(If you click "DO IT" the flexform will be fix with the correct style)
Search "wrong languages" in contentlist
Search for jfmulticontent content elements with wrong languages in contentlist:
Found ###COUNT### content elements.
Should the updater fix this settings?
(If you click "DO IT" the contentlist will be fix with the default language)
